name: calgary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the Canadian province of Alberta: They have been best friends since they grew up playing youth soccer together back in Calgary. Calgary is known for its annual rodeo and stampede, and for being the beef capital of Canada.
More examplesFewer examplesCaroline flew from Heathrow to Calgary with Air Canada.The company has grown rapidly in the last several years and recently found itself operating out of eight buildings in and around Calgary.I agree with Difan of Calgary's comments.We flew into a cold and grey Calgary airport and rented a car for the two-hour drive to Lake Louise.
